Parameters: String: the word to add to the dictionary. This should not be null or empty.
String: optional shortcut spelling for this word. When the shortcut is typed, the word may be suggested by applications that support it. May be null.
Locale: the locale to insert the word for, or null to insert the word for all locales.
addWord(android.content.Context,java.lan.Description: Adds a word to the dictionary, with the given frequency and the specified locale type.
addWord(android.content.Context,java.lan.FullName: public static void addWord (Context context, String word, int frequency, String shortcut, Locale locale)

Parameters: String: the word to add to the dictionary. This should not be null or empty.
int: the locale type for this word. It should be one of @B_android#provider#UserDictionary#Words#LOCALE_TYPE_ALL_E@ or @B_android#provider#UserDictionary#Words#LOCALE_TYPE_CURRENT_E@.
addWord(android.content.Context,java.lan.Description: Please use @B_android#provider#UserDictionary#Words#addWord_E@ instead. Adds a word to the dictionary, with the given frequency and the specified specified locale type.
addWord(android.content.Context,java.lan.history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 16
addWord(android.content.Context,java.lan.FullName: public static void addWord (Context context, String word, int frequency, int localeType)
